name: Enraged!!!
description:
You are angry and out of control, breaking everything you see. Fight against yourself and try to minimize destruction.

How To Play:You are the red thing
Don't smash into the yellow things
Controller recommended. Use left stick.
On keyboard use arrow keys or WASD
Game starts by clicking the button, hitting Enter, or pressing the X button on controller (I only have an X360 controller, I don't know what buttons you have available)
